Jones University.

Kelly

messages.subject: Playtime
messages.msgSnippet: My school-at-home friend (whom I love dearly, she is just WAY too anal) asked, you mean she just plays all day? She was referring to my 5 YEAR OLD! She s
messages.messageBody:
My "school-at-home" friend (whom I love dearly, she is just WAY too
anal) asked, "you mean she just plays all day?" She was referring to
my 5 YEAR OLD! She's 5!!! "I" play all day! Play is what it's all
about- Who wants to grow up anyway?
We are going to try a playgroup through our local HS assoc.- wish me
luck! (this is Bob Jones curriculum land!)
Last time we tried a playgroup Eve was asked- "You mean you are
allowed to read Harry Potter?! gasp!" She answered yes, although I
don't think she even knows who he is (snicker)
Reenie
